# delegate

**Instance Property**

The delegate of the gesture recognizer.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor weak var delegate: (any UIGestureRecognizerDelegate)? { get set }
```

## Discussion

The gesture recognizer maintains a weak reference to its delegate. The delegate must adopt the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIGestureRecognizerDelegate] protocol and implement one or more of its methods.

## Managing gesture-related interactions

- **UIGestureRecognizerDelegate**: A set of methods implemented by the delegate of a gesture recognizer to fine-tune an app’s gesture-recognition behavior.
